alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, southeastern Pike, northern Upson and northeastern Talbot Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Lincoln Park, or near Thomaston, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Manchester, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, Atwater, Lifsey Springs, Redbone Crossroads, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Pleasant Hill, Sunnyside, Hannahs Mill, and Big Lazer Creek Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
